import { memo, useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react'; import './style.css'; import useCheckUser from '../../hooks/useCheckUser'; import useLoacalStorage from '../../hooks/useLocalStorage'; //@ts-ignore import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from "../button/button"; const Header = () => { const [btn, setBtn] = useState(""); const { hidden } = useCheckUser() const { displayName } = useLoacalStorage() useEffect(() => { if (!hidden) { setBtn("log Out") } else { setBtn("log in") } }, [hidden]) const handleLogButton = useCallback(() => { if (hidden) { window.location.assign("/") } else { window.location.assign("/") localStorage.removeItem('salam') } }, [hidden]) console.log(displayName) return ( <>

{displayName && {`Current User is ${displayName} `}} {/* */}
) }; export default memo(Header);
